lines.gurmukhi: jYsy bCurw ibllwq mwq imlby kau; bMDn kY bis kCu bsu n bswq hY [

Unknown.translation: Just as a calf writhes and wriggles to meet his mother but tethered with rope makes him helpless.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ v`Cw mwˆ gwˆ nUM imlx vwsqy AVOˆdw hY, pr bMDn dy ADIn r`sy nwl jkiVAw hox kr ky Es dw kuC v`s nhIˆ cl sikAw krdw[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy qau ibgwrI cwhY Bvn gvn kIE; pr bis pry icqvq hI ibhwq hY [

Unknown.translation: Just as a person caught in forced or unpaid labour wants to go home and spends time planning while remaining in other's control.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ Pyr ivgwry PiVAw AwdmI Gr nUM jwxw locdw hY, pr prweI ADIngI ivc ipAwˆ, ievyˆ hI icqvidAwˆ ivcwry dw smwˆ bIq jwieAw krdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy ibrhnI ipRA sMgm snyhu cwhy; lwj kul AMks kY durbl gwq hY [

Unknown.translation: Just as a wife separated from her husband wants love and union but cannot do so for fear of family shame and thus loses her physical attraction.

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy gur crn srin suK cwhY isKu; AwigAw bD rhq ibdys Akulwq hY [520[

Unknown.translation: Similarly a true disciple wants to enjoy the pleasures of the refuge of True Guru but bound by his command he wanders around dejectedly in another place.  (520)
